resources.string: Only the top 20%% of Treem members are eligible to earn financial rewards. Unfortunately, you are not \"in the money\" at %d%%. Get working, invite new friends, post more, maybe invite your mom to join (ok now we are getting crazy).\nRemember that only those in the top 80th percentile are rewarded when Treem goes public

Only the top 20%% of Treem members are eligible to earn financial rewards. Congratulations, you are \"in the money\" at %d%%. Get working, invite new friends, post more, maybe invite your mom to join (ok now we are getting crazy).\nRemember that only those in the top 80th percentile are rewarded when Treem goes public
